## RTCEngine.requestPermission() method

请求录屏权限

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static requestPermission(callback: QNScreenPermissionResultCallback): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | [QNScreenPermissionResultCallback](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qnscreenpermissionresultcallback.md) | 请求录屏权限后回调 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

只支持安卓，创建 QNScreenVideoTrack 前安卓需要调用此接口获取对应权限
